posts.post_content:
Posted By: Dave
Please help me complete my t206 Brooklyn Set. I need Bill Bergen (with bat) and George Bell (follow through) in SGC 40 or 50 condition. No back preference. Please e-mail me if you have either of these cards and are willing to sell.

davegeorge76@yahoo.com
